p: Normal human skin dermis cell line (HSD) was obtained from Alzamil chair for cancer research and ethically approved by King Fahad Medical Center, Jeddah, KSA. HSD cell line was cultured in complete DMEM growth medium at a density of 1 × 10 5 cells/well and 1.5 mL/well in 12-well plates. Cells were grown in a 5% CO 2 incubator at 37 °C in a humidified atmosphere. It was passaged twice weekly or when cells were about 70–80% confluence [ 16].
